aboutPage.title: Building Technology for Human Flourishing
aboutPage.subtitle: CyberEco is on a mission to create digital tools that empower individuals and strengthen communities

intro.title: Who We Are
intro.paragraph1: CyberEco is more than a technology platform – we're a movement towards digital sovereignty, where individuals reclaim control over their digital lives. Founded in 2024, we're building the infrastructure for a more equitable, sustainable, and human-centered digital future.
intro.paragraph2: Our journey began with a simple observation: the current digital landscape often treats people as products rather than participants. We believe it's time for a fundamental shift in how we think about and interact with technology.

purpose.title: Why We Exist
purpose.quote: Technology should adapt to humanity, not the other way around.
purpose.text: In an era where digital platforms often prioritize profit over people, CyberEco stands as a beacon for change. We exist to demonstrate that technology can be both powerful and respectful, innovative and inclusive, profitable and principled.

what.title: What We Are
what.text: CyberEco is a comprehensive digital ecosystem designed from the ground up with human values at its core. We're not just another tech company – we're architects of a new digital paradigm.
what.point1: A unified platform that respects user privacy and data sovereignty
what.point2: A collection of interconnected applications that work seamlessly together
what.point3: A community-driven initiative that prioritizes user needs over corporate interests
what.point4: A sustainable technology model that considers environmental and social impact
what.conclusion: Every line of code we write, every feature we implement, and every decision we make is guided by a simple principle: technology should enhance human life, not complicate it.

visionMission.title: Vision & Mission
visionMission.visionText: A world where technology serves humanity, enabling individuals to thrive in a connected, sustainable, and equitable digital ecosystem.
visionMission.missionText: To build and nurture a comprehensive digital platform that empowers individuals with tools for financial collaboration, community engagement, and personal growth, while maintaining the highest standards of privacy, security, and user sovereignty.

value1.title: Human Dignity
value1.text: Every person deserves respect and agency in their digital life. We design with empathy and consideration for all users.

value2.title: Digital Sovereignty
value2.text: Your data belongs to you. We champion user control and transparent data practices.

value3.title: Sustainable Innovation
value3.text: We build for the long term, considering environmental and social impacts in every decision.

value4.title: Community First
value4.text: Our success is measured by the value we create for our community, not just our bottom line.

value5.title: Radical Transparency
value5.text: We believe in open communication, clear documentation, and honest relationships with our users.

joinUs.title: Join Our Journey
joinUs.text: Whether you're a developer passionate about ethical technology, a user seeking better digital tools, or someone who believes in our vision of a human-centered digital future, there's a place for you in the CyberEco community.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.description: We're a distributed team of passionate technologists, designers, and advocates for digital rights.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: CyberEco was born from the frustration of seeing technology increasingly designed to extract value from users rather than provide it. We witnessed social media platforms optimizing for addiction, financial apps charging hidden fees, and data being harvested without consent. We knew there had to be a better way.
story.quote: "Technology is best when it brings people together." - Matt Mullenweg
story.continuation: Starting with JustSplit, a simple expense-sharing app, we proved that useful software doesn't need to exploit users. Now we're building an entire ecosystem of applications based on principles of digital sovereignty, privacy, and human-centered design.

values.title: Our Values
values.content: We are guided by principles of human dignity, digital sovereignty, sustainable innovation, community-first approach, and radical transparency. These values shape every decision we make and every line of code we write.

team.title: The Team
team.content: We're a diverse, distributed team of passionate individuals united by a common vision. Our team includes software engineers, designers, privacy advocates, and community builders from around the world, all working together to create a more humane digital future.
team.description: CyberEco is built by a distributed team of developers, designers, and dreamers who believe in a better digital future.

future.title: The Future We're Building
future.content: We envision a world where technology adapts to humanity, not the other way around. Our roadmap includes expanding our ecosystem with new applications that address real human needs while maintaining our commitment to privacy, sustainability, and user empowerment.
future.description: By 2030, we envision CyberEco as a fully decentralized ecosystem where users have complete sovereignty over their digital lives. No central servers, no data harvesting, no surveillance capitalism - just useful tools that make life better.
future.callToAction: Join us in building a more human digital future.

mission.title: Mission & Values
mission.missionStatement: To create a digital ecosystem that enhances human well-being, fosters authentic connections, and supports sustainable living through technology that respects user sovereignty and privacy.

sovereignty.title: Digital Sovereignty
sovereignty.description: Users own their data, identity, and digital presence

humanCentered.title: Human-Centered Design
humanCentered.description: Technology serves people, not profit metrics

transparency.title: Radical Transparency
transparency.description: Open development, clear business models, honest communication

sustainability.title: Long-term Thinking
sustainability.description: Building for decades, not quarterly reports

openSource.title: Open Source When Possible
openSource.description: We believe in transparency and community contribution

noVenture.title: No Venture Capital
noVenture.description: We grow sustainably without pressure to exploit users

community.title: Community Governance
community.description: Users have a real voice in platform development

hero.backgroundText: We believe technology should serve humanity, not exploit it. Our journey began with a simple question: What if digital tools actually made life better?
